Whiskyplot: Faceted Boxplots with Gene Expression and Pairwise Statistics

whiskyplot.Rd

Subsets a normalized count matrix (TMM or TPM) to a set of genes, merges with sample metadata, and draws faceted boxplots (“whisker plots”) with jittered points. Pairwise comparisons are computed via rstatix and annotated by ggpubr.

Usage

whiskyplot(
  tmm,
  genes,
  metadata,
  sample_col = "samples",
  group_col = "samples",
  test = c("wilcox", "t"),
  p.adjust.method = "none",
  comparisons = NULL,
  plot_title = "Gene expression",
  x_lab = group_col,
  y_lab = "log(TPM + 1)"
)

Arguments

tmm

A numeric matrix or data frame (rows = genes, columns = samples).

genes

Character vector of gene names (must match rownames(tmm)).

metadata

A data frame of sample metadata; must contain a column matching sample_col, and row names matching colnames(tmm).

sample_col

Character; metadata column containing sample IDs (default "samples").

group_col

Character; metadata column defining comparison groups (default "samples").

test

Character; which test to run—either "wilcox" or "t". Default "wilcox".

p.adjust.method

Character; p-value adjustment method for rstatix (default "none").

comparisons

Optional list of pairwise comparisons (each a length-2 character vector). If NULL, all pairwise combinations are tested.

plot_title

Character; overall plot title (default "Gene expression").

x_lab

Character; x-axis label (default = group_col).

y_lab

Character; y-axis label (default "log(TMM/TPM + 1)").

Value

A ggplot object: faceted whisker plots annotated with significant p-values.

Details

  1. Verifies group_col exists in metadata.

  2. Subsets tmm to genes, reshapes to long form.

  3. Merges in metadata, drops samples missing group_col.

  4. Keeps only genes present in ≥2 groups.

  5. Runs pairwise tests per gene via rstatix, filters p ≤ 0.05.

  6. Computes safe y.position for each gene’s annotation.

  7. Draws boxplots + jitter; adds p-value annotations with ggpubr.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  comps <- list(c("NM_IgM","NWT_IgM"), c("NM_NT","NWT_NT"))
  whiskyplot(
    tmm             = tmm,
    genes           = rownames(tmm_allint),
    metadata        = meta,
    sample_col      = "SampleID",
    group_col       = "sample_complete",
    test            = "wilcox",
    p.adjust.method = "BH",
    comparisons     = comps,
    plot_title      = "Whiskyplot: Gene Expression",
    x_lab           = "Experimental Group",
    y_lab           = "Log(TPM + 1)"
  )
} # }
